Summary

I am a second year Master Student at MIPT also I do research at Bayes Group under supervision of prof. Dmitry Vetrov. My research is focused on Bayesian regularization of deep neural nets. At MIPT, MSU, HSE I teach several Machine Learning courses. My resume is available here.

News

  • We have released preprint on Variational Dropout Sparsifies DNNs, I would be happy to discuss it.
